words.translation: Alif Laam Ra|These|(are the) Verses|(of) the Book|[the] clear

translations.1: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaabil Mubeen
translations.2: Aliflamra tilka ayatu alkitabi almubeenu

words.translation: Indeed, We|We have sent it down|(as) a Quran in Arabic|(as) a Quran in Arabic|so that you may|understand

translations.1: Innaaa anzalnaahu quraanan 'Arabiyyal la-'allakum ta'qiloon
translations.2: Inna anzalnahu quranan AAarabiyyan laAAallakum taAAqiloona

words.translation: We|relate|to you|the best|of the narrations|in what|We have revealed|to you|(of) this|the Quran|although|you were|before it|before it|surely among|the unaware

translations.1: Nahnu naqussu 'alaika ahsanal qasasi bimaaa awhainaaa ilaika haazal quraana Wa-in kunta min qablihee laminal ghaafileen
translations.2: Nahnu naqussu AAalayka ahsana alqasasi bima awhayna ilayka hatha alqurana wain kunta min qablihi lamina alghafileena

words.translation: When|said|Yusuf|to his father|O my father|Indeed, I|I saw|eleven|eleven|star(s)|and the sun|and the moon|I saw them|to me|prostrating

translations.1: Iz qaala Yoosufu li-abeehi yaaa-abati innee ra-aytu ahada 'ashara kawkabanw wash-shamsa walqamara ra-aytuhum lee saajideen
translations.2: Ith qala yoosufu liabeehi ya abati innee raaytu ahada AAashara kawkaban waalshshamsa waalqamara raaytuhum lee sajideena

words.translation: He said|O my son!|(Do) not|relate|your vision|to|your brothers|lest they plan|against you|a plot|Indeed|the Shaitaan|(is) to man|an enemy|open

translations.1: Qaala yaa-bunaiya laa taqsus ru'yaaka 'alaaa ikhwatika fayakeedoo laka kaidaa; innash Shaitaana lil-insaani 'aduwwum mubeen
translations.2: Qala ya bunayya la taqsus ruyaka AAala ikhwatika fayakeedoo laka kaydan inna alshshaytana lilinsani AAaduwwun mubeenun

words.translation: And thus|will choose you|your Lord|and will teach you|of|(the) interpretation|(of) the narratives|and complete|His Favor|on you|and on|(the) family|(of) Yaqub|as|He completed it|on|your two forefathers|before|before|Ibrahim|and Ishaq|Indeed|your Lord|(is) All-Knower|All-Wise

translations.1: Wa-kazaalika yajtabeeka rabbuka Wa-yu'allimuka min ta'weelil ahaadeesi Wa-yutimmu ni'matahoo 'alaika Wa-'alaaa Aali Ya'qooba kamaaa atammahaa 'alaaa abawaika min qablu Ibraaheema Wa-Ishaaq; inna Rabbaka 'Aleemun hakeem
translations.2: Wakathalika yajtabeeka rabbuka wayuAAallimuka min taweeli alahadeethi wayutimmu niAAmatahu AAalayka waAAala ali yaAAqooba kama atammaha AAala abawayka min qablu ibraheema waishaqa inna rabbaka AAaleemun hakeemun

words.translation: Certainly|were|in|Yusuf|and his brothers|signs|for those who ask

translations.1: Laqad kaana fee Yoosufa Wa-ikhwatiheee Aayaatul lissaaa'ileen
translations.2: Laqad kana fee yoosufa waikhwatihi ayatun lilssaileena

words.translation: When|they said|Surely Yusuf|and his brother|(are) more beloved|to|our father|than we|while we|(are) a group|Indeed|our father|(is) surely in|an error|clear

translations.1: Iz qaaloo la-Yoosufu Wa-akhoohu ahabbu ilaaa Abeenaa minnaa Wa-nahnu 'usbatun; inna abaanaa lafee dalaalim mubeen
translations.2: Ith qaloo layoosufu waakhoohu ahabbu ila abeena minna wanahnu AAusbatun inna abana lafee dalalin mubeenin

words.translation: Kill|Yusuf|or|cast him|(to) a land|so will be free|for you|(the) face|(of) your father|and you will be|after that|after that|a people|righteous

translations.1: Uqtuloo Yoosufa awitra hoohu ardany yakhlu lakum wajhu abeekum Wa-takoonoo mim ba'dihee qawman saaliheen
translations.2: Oqtuloo yoosufa awi itrahoohu ardan yakhlu lakum wajhu abeekum watakoonoo min baAAdihi qawman saliheena

words.translation: Said|a speaker|among them|(Do) not|kill|Yusuf|but throw him|in|the bottom|(of) the well|will pick him|some|[the] caravan|if|you are|doing

translations.1: Qaalaa qaaa'ilum minhum laa taqtuloo Yoosufa Wa-alqoohu fee ghayaabatil jubbi yaltaqithu badus sai-yaarati in kuntum faa-'ileen
translations.2: Qala qailun minhum la taqtuloo yoosufa waalqoohu fee ghayabati aljubbi yaltaqithu baAAdu alssayyarati in kuntum faAAileena

words.translation: They said|O our father!|Why|(do) you|not|trust us|with|Yusuf|while indeed we|(are) for him|surely well-wishers

translations.1: Qaaloo yaaa-abaanaa maa laka laa ta'mannaa 'alaa Yoosufa Wa-innaa lahoo lanaa-sihoon
translations.2: Qaloo ya abana ma laka la tamanna AAala yoosufa wainna lahu lanasihoona

words.translation: Send him|with us|tomorrow|(to) enjoy|and play|And indeed, we|for him|(will) surely (be) guardians

translations.1: Arsillhu ma'anaa ghadany yarta'wa yal'ab Wa-innaa lahoo lahaafizoon
translations.2: Arsilhu maAAana ghadan yartaAA wayalAAab wainna lahu lahafithoona

words.translation: He said|Indeed, [I]|it surely saddens me|that|you should take him|you should take him|and I fear|that|would eat him|a wolf|while you|of him|(are) unaware

translations.1: Qaala innee la-yahzununeee an tazhaboo bihee Wa-akhaafu any ya'kulahuz zi'bu Wa-antum 'anhu ghaafiloon
translations.2: Qala innee layahzununee an thathhaboo bihi waakhafu an yakulahu alththibu waantum AAanhu ghafiloona

words.translation: They said|If|eats him|the wolf|while we|(are) a group|indeed we|then|surely (would be) losers

translations.1: Qaaloo la-in akalahuz zi'bu Wa-nahnu 'usbatun innaaa izal lakhaasiroon
translations.2: Qaloo lain akalahu alththibu wanahnu AAusbatun inna ithan lakhasiroona

words.translation: So when|they took him|they took him|and agreed|that|they put him|in|(the) bottom|(of) the well|But We inspired|to him|Surely, you will inform them|about (this) affair|this|while they|(do) not|perceive

translations.1: Falammaa zahaboo bihee Wa-ajma'ooo aien yaj'aloohu fee ghayaabatil jubb; Wa-awhainaaa ilaihi latunabbi-'annahum bi-amrihim haaza Wa-hum laa yash'uroon
translations.2: Falamma thahaboo bihi waajmaAAoo an yajAAaloohu fee ghayabati aljubbi waawhayna ilayhi latunabiannahum biamrihim hatha wahum la yashAAuroona

words.translation: And they came|(to) their father|early at night|weeping

translations.1: Wa-jaaa'ooo abaahum 'ishaaa-'aien yabkoon
translations.2: Wajaoo abahum AAishaan yabkoona

words.translation: They said|O our father!|Indeed we|[we] went|racing each other|and we left|Yusuf|with|our possessions|and ate him|the wolf|But not|you|(will) believe|us|even if|we are|truthful

translations.1: Qaaloo yaaa-abaanaaa innaa zahabnaa nastabiqu Wa-taraknaa Yoosufa 'inda mataa'inaa fa-akhalahuz zi'b, Wa-maaa anta bimu'minil lanaa Wa-law kunnaa saadiqeen
translations.2: Qaloo ya abana inna thahabna nastabiqu watarakna yoosufa AAinda mataAAina faakalahu alththibu wama anta bimuminin lana walaw kunna sadiqeena

words.translation: And they brought|upon|his shirt|with false blood|with false blood|He said|Nay|has enticed you|has enticed you|your souls|(to) a matter|so patience|(is) beautiful|And Allah|(is) the One sought for help|against|what|you describe

translations.1: Wa-jaaa'oo 'alaa qameesi-hee bidamin kazib qaala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amraa; fasabrun jameel; wallaahul musta'aanu 'alaa maa tasifoon
translations.2: Wajaoo AAala qameesihi bidamin kathibin qala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jameelun waAllahu almustaAAanu AAala ma tasifoona

words.translation: And there came|a caravan|and they sent|their water drawer|then he let down|his bucket|He said|O good news!|This|(is) a boy|And they hid him|(as) a merchandise|And Allah|(is) All- Knower|of what|they do

translations.1: Wa-jaaa'at saiyyaaratun fa-arsaloo waaridahum fa-adlaa dalwah; qaala yaa-bushraa haaza ghulaam; Wa-asarroohu bi-daa'ah; wallaahu 'aleemum bimaa ya'maloon
translations.2: Wajaat sayyaratun faarsaloo waridahum faadla dalwahu qala ya bushra hatha ghulamun waasarroohu bidaAAatan waAllahu AAaleemun bima yaAAmaloona

words.translation: And they sold him|for a price|very low|dirhams|few|and they were|about him|of|those keen to give up

translations.1: Wa-sharawhu bisamanim bakhsin daraahima ma'doo-datinw Wa-kaanoo feehi minaz zaahideen
translations.2: Washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darahima maAAdoodatin wakanoo feehi mina alzzahideena

words.translation: And said|the one who|bought him|of|Egypt|to his wife|Make comfortable|his stay|Perhaps|that|(he) will benefit us|or|we will take him|(as) a son|And thus|We established|Yusuf|in|the land|that We might teach him|(the) interpretation of|(the) interpretation of|the events|And Allah|(is) Predominant|over|His affairs|but|most|(of) the people|(do) not|know

translations.1: Wa-qaalal lazish taraahu mim Misra limra atiheee akrimee maswaahu 'asaaa any-yanfa'anaaa aw nattakhizahoo waladaa; Wa-kazaalika mak-kannaa li-Yoosufa fil ardi Wa-linu'allimahoo min ta'weelil ahaadees; wallaahu ghaalibun 'alaaa amrihee Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
translations.2: Waqala allathee ishtarahu min misra liimraatihi akrimee mathwahu AAasa an yanfaAAana aw nattakhithahu waladan wakathalika makkanna liyoosufa fee alardi walinuAAallimahu min taweeli alahadeethi waAllahu ghalibun AAala amrihi walakinna akthara alnnasi la yaAAlamoona

words.translation: And when|he reached|his maturity|We gave him|wisdom|and knowledge|And thus|We reward|the good-doers

translations.1: Wa-lammaa balagha ashuddahooo aatainaahu hukmanw Wa-'ilmaa; Wa-kazaa-lika najzil muhsineen
translations.2: Walamma balagha ashuddahu ataynahu hukman waAAilman wakathalika najzee almuhsineena

words.translation: And sought to seduce him|she who|he (was)|in|her house|from|his self|And she closed|the doors|and she said|Come on|you|He said|I seek refuge in Allah|I seek refuge in Allah|Indeed, he|(is) my lord|(who has) made good|my stay|Indeed|not|will succeed|the wrongdoers

translations.1: Wa-raawadat-hul latee huwa fee baitihaa 'an nafsihee Wa-ghallaqatil abwaaba Wa-qaalat haita lak; qaala ma'aazal laahi innahoo rabbeee ahsana maswaay; innahoo laa yuflihuz zaalimoon
translations.2: Warawadathu allatee huwa fee baytiha AAan nafsihi waghallaqati alabwaba waqalat hayta laka qala maAAatha Allahi innahu rabbee ahsana mathwaya innahu la yuflihu alththalimoona

words.translation: And certainly|she did desire|him|and he would have desired|her|if not|that|he saw|the proof|(of) his Lord|Thus|that We might avert|from him|the evil|and the immorality|Indeed he|(was) of|Our slaves|the sincere

translations.1: Wa-laqad hammat bihee Wa-hamma bihaa law-laaa ar ra-aa burhaana rabbih; kazaalika linasrifa 'anhu sooo'a walfa-hshaaa'; innahoo min 'ibaadi-nal mukhlaseen
translations.2: Walaqad hammat bihi wahamma biha lawla an raa burhana rabbihi kathalika linasrifa AAanhu alssooa waalfahshaa innahu min AAibadina almukhlaseena

words.translation: And they both raced|(to) the door|and she tore|his shirt|from|the back|and they both found|her husband|at|the door|She said|What|(is) the recompense|(of one) who|intended|for your wife|evil|except|that|he be imprisoned|or|a punishment|painful

translations.1: Wastabaqal baaba Wa-qaddat qameesahoo min duburinw Wa-alfayaa saiyidahaa ladal baab; qaalat maa jazaaa'u man araada bi ahlika sooo'an illaaa any-yusjana aw azaabun 'aleem
translations.2: Waistabaqa albaba waqaddat qameesahu min duburin waalfaya sayyidaha lada albabi qalat ma jazao man arada biahlika sooan illa an yusjana aw AAathabun aleemun

words.translation: He said|She|sought to seduce me|about|myself|And testified|a witness|of|her family|If|[is]|his shirt|(is) torn|from|the front|then she has spoken the truth|and he|(is) of|the liars

translations.1: Qaala hiya raawadatnee 'an nafsee Wa-shahida shaahidum min ahlihaa in kaana qameesuhoo qudda min qubulin fasadaqat Wa-huwa minal kaazibeen
translations.2: Qala hiya rawadatnee AAan nafsee washahida shahidun min ahliha in kana qameesuhu qudda min qubulin fasadaqat wahuwa mina alkathibeena

words.translation: But if|[is]|his shirt|(is) torn|from|(the) back|then she has lied|and he|(is) of|the truthful

translations.1: Wa-in kaana qameesuhoo qudda min duburin fakazabat Wa-huwa minas saadiqeen
translations.2: Wain kana qameesuhu qudda min duburin fakathabat wahuwa mina alssadiqeena

words.translation: So when|he saw|his shirt|torn|from|(the) back|he said|Indeed it|(is) of|your plot|Indeed|your plot|(is) great

translations.1: Falammaa ra-aa qamee-sahoo qudda min duburin qaala innahoo min kaidikunna inna kaidakunna 'azeem
translations.2: Falamma raa qameesahu qudda min duburin qala innahu min kaydikunna inna kaydakunna AAatheemun

words.translation: Yusuf|turn away|from|this|And [O my wife] ask forgiveness|for your sin|Indeed you|are|of|the sinful

translations.1: Yoosufu a'rid 'an haaza wastaghfiree li-zanbiki innaki kunti minal khaati'een
translations.2: Yoosufu aAArid AAan hatha waistaghfiree lithanbiki innaki kunti mina alkhatieena

words.translation: And said|women|in|the city|The wife of|Aziz|(is) seeking to seduce|her slave boy|about|himself|indeed|he has impassioned her|(with) love|Indeed we|[we] surely see her|in|an error|clear

translations.1: Wa-qaala niswatun fil madeenatim ra-atul 'Azeezi turaawidu fataahaa 'an nafsihee qad shaghafahaa hubbaa; innaa lana-raahaa fee dalaalim mubeen
translations.2: Waqala niswatun fee almadeenati imraatu alAAazeezi turawidu fataha AAan nafsihi qad shaghafaha hubban inna lanaraha fee dalalin mubeenin

words.translation: So when|she heard|of their scheming|she sent|for them|and she prepared|for them|a banquet|and she gave|each|one|of them|a knife|and she said|Come out|before them|Then when|they saw him|they greatly admired him|and cut|their hands|they said|Forbid|Allah|not|(is) this|a man|not|(is) this|but|an angel|noble

translations.1: Falammaa sami'at bimak-rihinna arsalat ilaihinna Wa-a'tadat lahunna muttaka-anw Wa-aatat kulla waahidatim min-hunna sikkeenanw Wa-qaala-tikh ruj 'alaihinna falammaa ra-aynahooo akbarnahoo Wa-qatta'na aydiyahunna Wa-qulna haasha lillaahi maa haaza basharaa; in haazaaa illaa malakun kareem
translations.2: Falamma samiAAat bimakrihinna arsalat ilayhinna waaAAtadat lahunna muttakaan waatat kulla wahidatin minhunna sikkeenan waqalati okhruj AAalayhinna falamma raaynahu akbarnahu waqattaAAna aydiyahunna waqulna hasha lillahi ma hatha basharan in hatha illa malakun kareemun

words.translation: She said|That|(is) the one|you blamed me|about him|And certainly|I sought to seduce him|[from]|[himself]|but he saved himself|and if|not|he does|what|I order him|surely he will be imprisoned|and certainly will be|of|those who are disgraced

translations.1: Qaalat fazaalikunnal lazee lumtunnanee feeh; Wa-laqad raawattuhoo 'an nafsihee fasta'sam; Wa-la'il lam yaf'al maaa aamuruhoo la-yusjananna Wa-la-yakoonam minas saaghireen
translations.2: Qalat fathalikunna allathee lumtunnanee feehi walaqad rawadtuhu AAan nafsihi faistAAsama walain lam yafAAal ma amuruhu layusjananna walayakoonan mina alssaghireena

words.translation: He said|My Lord|the prison|(is) dearer|to me|than what|they invite me|to it|And unless|You turn away|from me|their plot|I might incline|towards them|and [I] be|of|the ignorant

translations.1: Qaala rabbis sijnu ahabbu ilaiyya mimma yad'oo-naneee 'ilaihi Wa-illaa tasrif 'annee kaidahunna asbu ilaihinna Wa-akum minal jaahileen
translations.2: Qala rabbi alssijnu ahabbu ilayya mimma yadAAoonanee ilayhi wailla tasrif AAannee kaydahunna asbu ilayhinna waakun mina aljahileena

words.translation: So responded|to him|his Lord|and turned away|from him|their plot|Indeed [He]|He|(is) All-Hearer|All-Knower

translations.1: Fastajaaba lahoo rabbuhoo fasarafa 'anhu kaidahunn; innahoo huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem
translations.2: Faistajaba lahu rabbuhu fasarafa AAanhu kaydahunna innahu huwa alssameeAAu alAAaleemu

words.translation: Then|(it) appeared|to them|after|after|[what]|they had seen|the signs|surely they should imprison him|until|a time

translations.1: Summa badaa lahum min ba'di maa ra-awul Aayaati layasjununnahoo hatta heen
translations.2: Thumma bada lahum min baAAdi ma raawoo alayati layasjununnahu hatta heenin

words.translation: And entered|with him|(in) the prison|two young men|Said|one of them|Indeed I|[I] see myself|pressing|wine|And said|the other|Indeed I|[I] see myself|[I am] carrying|over|my head|bread|(were) eating|the birds|from it|Inform us|of its interpretation|indeed we|[we] see you|of|the good-doers

translations.1: Wa-dakhala ma'a hussijna fata-yaan; qaala ahaduhumaaa inneee araaneee a'siru khamranw Wa-qaalal aakharu inneee araaneee ahmilu fawqa ra'see khubzan ta'kulut tairu minhu; nabbi'naa bi-ta'weelih; innaa naraaka minal muhsineen
translations.2: Wadakhala maAAahu alssijna fatayani qala ahaduhuma innee aranee aAAsiru khamran waqala alakharu innee aranee ahmilu fawqa rasee khubzan takulu alttayru minhu nabbina bitaweelihi inna naraka mina almuhsineena

words.translation: He said|Not|(will) come to both of you|food|you are provided with|but|I will inform both of you|of its interpretation|before|[that]|[it] comes to both of you|That|(is) of what|has taught me|my Lord|Indeed I|[I] abandon|(the) religion|(of) a people|not|they believe|in Allah|and they|in the Hereafter|[they]|(are) disbelievers

translations.1: Qaala laa ya'teekumaa ta'aamun turzaqaaniheee illaa nabba'tukumaa bi-ta'weelihee; qabla aien ya'ti-yakumaa; zaalikumaa mimmaa 'allamanee rabbee; innee taraktu millata qawmil laa yu'minoona billaahi wahum bil-aakhirati hum kaafiroon
translations.2: Qala la yateekuma taAAamun turzaqanihi illa nabbatukuma bitaweelihi qabla an yatiyakuma thalikuma mimma AAallamanee rabbee innee taraktu millata qawmin la yuminoona biAllahi wahum bialakhirati hum kafiroona

words.translation: And I follow|(the) religion|(of) my forefathers|Ibrahim|and Ishaq|and Yaqub|Not|was|for us|that|we associate|with Allah|any|thing|That|(is) from|(the) Grace|(of) Allah|upon us|and upon|the mankind|but|most|(of) the men|(are) not|grateful

translations.1: Wattaba'tu millata aabaaa'eee Ibraaheema Wa-Iss-haaqa Wa-Ya'qoob; maa kaana lanaaa an nushrika billaahi min shai'; zaalika min fadlil laahi 'alainaa Wa-'alan naasi Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yashkuroon
translations.2: WaittabaAAtu millata abaee ibraheema waishaqa wayaAAqooba ma kana lana an nushrika biAllahi min shayin thalika min fadli Allahi AAalayna waAAala alnnasi walakinna akthara alnnasi la yashkuroona

words.translation: O my two companions|(of) the prison!|Are lords|separate|better|or|Allah|the One|the Irresistible

translations.1: Yaa-saahibayis sijni 'a-arbaabum mutafarriqoona khayrun amil laahul waahidul qahhaar
translations.2: Ya sahibayi alssijni aarbabun mutafarriqoona khayrun ami Allahu alwahidu alqahharu

words.translation: Not|you worship|besides Him|besides Him|but|names|which you have named them|you|and your forefathers|not|(has) sent down|Allah|for it|any|authority|Not|(is) the command|but|for Allah|He has commanded|that not|you worship|but|Him Alone|That|(is) the religion|the right|but|most|[the] men|(do) not|know

translations.1: Maa ta'budoona min doonihee illaaa asmaaa'an sam maitumoohaaa antum Wa-aabaaa'ukum maaa anzalal laahu bihaa min sultan; inilhukmu illaa lillaah; amara allaa ta'budooo illaaa iyyaah; zaalikad deenul qaiyimu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
translations.2: Ma taAAbudoona min doonihi illa asmaan sammaytumooha antum waabaokum ma anzala Allahu biha min sultanin ini alhukmu illa lillahi amara alla taAAbudoo illa iyyahu thalika alddeenu alqayyimu walakinna akthara alnnasi la yaAAlamoona

words.translation: O my two companions|(of) the prison|As for|one of you|he will give drink|(to) his master|wine|and as for|the other|he will be crucified|and will eat|the birds|from|his head|Has been decreed|the matter|about which|about which|you both inquire

translations.1: Yaa-saahibayis sijni ammaaa ahadukumaa fa-yasqee rabbahoo khamranw Wa-ammal aakharu fa-yuslabu fata'kulut tairu mir ra'sih; qudiyal amrul lazee feehi tastaftiyaan
translations.2: Ya sahibayi alssijni amma ahadukuma fayasqee rabbahu khamran waamma alakharu fayuslabu fatakulu alttayru min rasihi qudiya alamru allathee feehi tastaftiyani

words.translation: And he said|to the one whom|he thought|that he|(would be) saved|of both of them|Mention me|to|your master|But made him forget|the Shaitaan|(the) mention|(to) his master|so he remained|in|the prison|several|years

translations.1: Wa-qaala lillazee zanna annahoo najim minhumaz kurnee 'inda rabbika fa-ansaahush Shaitaanu zikra Rabbihee falabisa fis sijni bid'a sineen
translations.2: Waqala lillathee thanna annahu najin minhuma othkurnee AAinda rabbika faansahu alshshaytanu thikra rabbihi falabitha fee alssijni bidAAa sineena

words.translation: And said|the king|Indeed I|[I] have seen|seven|cows|fat|eating them|seven|lean ones|and seven|ears (of corn)|green|and other|dry|O|chiefs!|Explain to me|about|my vision|if|you can|of visions|interpret

translations.1: Wa-qaalal maliku inneee araa sab'a baqaraatin simaanien ya'kuluhunna sab'un 'ijaafunw Wa-sab'a sumbulaatin khudrinw Wa-ukhara yaabisaat; yaaa-ayyuhal mala-u aftoonee fee ru'yaaya in kuntum lirru'yaa ta'buroon
translations.2: Waqala almaliku innee ara sabAAa baqaratin simanin yakuluhunna sabAAun AAijafun wasabAAa sunbulatin khudrin waokhara yabisatin ya ayyuha almalao aftoonee fee ruyaya in kuntum lilrruya taAAburoona

words.translation: They said|Confused|dreams|and not|we|(are) in the interpretation|(of) the dreams|learned

translations.1: Qaalooo adghaasu ahlaa-minw Wa-maa nahnu bi-ta'weelil ahlaami bi'aalimeen
translations.2: Qaloo adghathu ahlamin wama nahnu bitaweeli alahlami biAAalimeena

words.translation: But said|the one who|was saved|of the two|and remembered|after|a period|I|[I] will inform you|of its interpretation|so send me forth

translations.1: Wa-qaalal lazee najaa minhumaa waddakara ba'da ummatin ana unabbi'ukum bi-ta'weelihee fa-arsiloon
translations.2: Waqala allathee naja minhuma waiddakara baAAda ommatin ana onabbiokum bitaweelihi faarsilooni

words.translation: Yusuf|O|the truthful one!|Explain to us|about|(the) seven|cows|fat|eating them|seven|lean ones|and seven|ears (of corn)|green|and other|dry|that I may|return|to|the people|so that they may|know

translations.1: Yoosufu ayyuhas siddeequ aftinaa fee sab'i baqaraatin simaaniny ya'kuluhunna sab'un 'ijaafunw Wa-sabi'i sumbulaatin khudrinw Wa-ukhara yaabisaatil la'alleee arji'u ilan naasi la'allahum ya'lamoon
translations.2: Yoosufu ayyuha alssiddeequ aftina fee sabAAi baqaratin simanin yakuluhunna sabAAun AAijafun wasabAAi sunbulatin khudrin waokhara yabisatin laAAallee arjiAAu ila alnnasi laAAallahum yaAAlamoona

words.translation: He said|You will sow|(for) seven|years|as usual|and that which|you reap|so leave it|in|its ears|except|a little|from which|you (will) eat

translations.1: Qaala tazra'oona sab'a sineena da-aban famaa hasattum fazaroohu fee sumbu-liheee illaa qaleelam mimmaa ta'kuloon
translations.2: Qala tazraAAoona sabAAa sineena daaban fama hasadtum fatharoohu fee sunbulihi illa qaleelan mimma takuloona

words.translation: Then|will come|after|after|that|seven|hard (years)|(which will) consume|what|you advanced|for them|except|a little|of what|you (will) store

translations.1: Thumma ya'tee mim ba'di zaalika sab'un shidaaduny ya'kulna maa qaddamtum lahunna illaa qaleelam mimma tuhsinoon
translations.2: Thumma yatee min baAAdi thalika sabAAun shidadun yakulna ma qaddamtum lahunna illa qaleelan mimma tuhsinoona

words.translation: Then|will come|after|after|that|a year|in it|will be given abundant rain|the people|and in it|they will press

translations.1: Thumma ya'tee mim ba'di zalika 'aamun feehi yughaa-sun naasu Wa-feehi ya'siroon
translations.2: Thumma yatee min baAAdi thalika AAamun feehi yughathu alnnasu wafeehi yaAAsiroona

words.translation: And said|the king|Bring him to me|Bring him to me|But when|came to him|the messenger|he said|Return|to|your lord|and ask him|what|(is the) case|(of) the women|who|cut|their hands|Indeed|my Lord|of their plot|(is) All-Knower

translations.1: Wa-qaalal maliku 'toonee bihee falammaa jaaa'ahur rasoolu qaalar ji ilaa rabbika fas'alhu maa baalun niswatil laatee qatta'na aydiyahunn; inna Rabbee bikaidihinna 'Aleem
translations.2: Waqala almaliku itoonee bihi falamma jaahu alrrasoolu qala irjiAA ila rabbika faisalhu ma balu alnniswati allatee qattaAAna aydiyahunna inna rabbee bikaydihinna AAaleemun

words.translation: He said|What|(was) your affair|when|you sought to seduce|Yusuf|from|himself|They said|Allah forbid|Allah forbid|Not|we know|about him|any|evil|Said|(the) wife|(of) Aziz|Now|(is) manifest|the truth|I|sought to seduce him|from|himself|and indeed, he|(is) surely of|the truthful

translations.1: Qaala maa khatbukunna iz raawattunna Yoosufa 'an nafsih; qulna haasha lillaahi maa 'alimnaa 'alaihi min sooo'; qaalatim ra-atul 'Azeezil 'aana hashasal haqq, ana raawat-tuhoo 'an nafsihee Wa-innahoo laminas saadiqeen
translations.2: Qala ma khatbukunna ith rawadtunna yoosufa AAan nafsihi qulna hasha lillahi ma AAalimna AAalayhi min sooin qalati imraatu alAAazeezi alana hashasa alhaqqu ana rawadtuhu AAan nafsihi wainnahu lamina alssadiqeena

words.translation: That|he may know|that I|not|[I] betray him|in secret|and that|Allah|(does) not|guide|(the) plan|(of) the betrayers

translations.1: Zaalika liya'lama annee lam akhunhu bilghaibi Wa-annal laaha laa yahdee kaidal khaaa'ineen
translations.2: Thalika liyaAAlama annee lam akhunhu bialghaybi waanna Allaha la yahdee kayda alkhaineena

words.translation: And not|I absolve|myself|Indeed|the soul|(is) a certain enjoiner|of evil|unless|[that]|bestows Mercy|my Lord|Indeed|my Lord|(is) Oft-Forgiving|Most Merciful

translations.1: Wa-maa ubarri'u nafsee; innan nafsa la-ammaaratum bissooo'i illaa maa rahima Rabbee; inna Rabbee Ghafoorur Raheem
translations.2: Wama obarrio nafsee inna alnnafsa laammaratun bialssooi illa ma rahima rabbee inna rabbee ghafoorun raheemun

words.translation: And said|the king|Bring him to me|Bring him to me|I will select him|for myself|Then when|he spoke to him|he said|Indeed, you|(are) today|with us|firmly established|(and) trusted

translations.1: Wa-qaalal maliku' toonee biheee astakhlishu linafsee falammaa kallamahoo qaala innakal yawma ladainaa makeenun ameen
translations.2: Waqala almaliku itoonee bihi astakhlishu linafsee falamma kallamahu qala innaka alyawma ladayna makeenun ameenun

words.translation: He said|Appoint me|over|(the) treasuries|(of) the land|Indeed I|(will be) a guardian|knowing

translations.1: Qaalaj 'alnee 'alaa khazaaa'inil ardi innee hafeezun 'aleem
translations.2: Qala ijAAalnee AAala khazaini alardi innee hafeethun AAaleemun

words.translation: And thus|We established|[to] Yusuf|in|the land|to settle|therein|where ever|he willed|We bestow|Our Mercy|(on) whom|We will|And not|We let go waste|(the) reward|(of) the good-doers

translations.1: Wa-kazaalika makkannaa li-Yoosufa fil ardi yatabawwa'u minhaa haisu yashaaaa'; nuseebu birahmatinaa man nashaaa'u Wa-laa nudee'u ajral muhsineen
translations.2: Wakathalika makanna liyoosufa fee alardi yatabawwao minha haythu yashao nuseebu birahmatina man nashao wala nudeeAAu ajra almuhsineena

words.translation: And surely (the) reward|(of) the Hereafter|(is) better|for those who|believe|and are|God conscious

translations.1: Wa-la-ajrul Aakhirati khairul lillazeena aamanoo Wa-kaanoo yattaqoon
translations.2: Walaajru alakhirati khayrun lillatheena amanoo wakanoo yattaqoona

words.translation: And came|(the) brothers|(of) Yusuf|and they entered|upon him|and he recognized them|but they|knew him not|knew him not

translations.1: Wa-jaaa'a ikhwatu Yoosufa fadakhaloo 'alaihi fa'arafahum Wa-hum lahoo munkiroon
translations.2: Wajaa ikhwatu yoosufa fadakhaloo AAalayhi faAAarafahum wahum lahu munkiroona

words.translation: And when|he had furnished them|with their supplies|he said|Bring to me|a brother|of yours|from|your father|Do not|you see|that I|[I] give full|[the] measure|and that I am|(the) best|(of) the hosts

translations.1: Wa-lammaa jahhazahum bijahaazihim qaala' toonee bi-akhil lakum min abeekum; alaa tarawna anneee oofil kaila Wa-ana khairul munzileen
translations.2: Walamma jahhazahum bijahazihim qala itoonee biakhin lakum min abeekum ala tarawna annee oofee alkayla waana khayru almunzileena

words.translation: But if|not|you bring him to me|you bring him to me|then (there will be) no|measure|for you|from me|and not|you will come near me

translations.1: Fa-il lam taatoonee bihee falaa kaila lakum 'indee Wa-laa taqraboon
translations.2: Fain lam tatoonee bihi fala kayla lakum AAindee wala taqrabooni

words.translation: They said|We will try to get permission|for him|(from) his father|and indeed we|surely will do

translations.1: Qaaloo sanuraawidu 'anhu abaahu Wa-innaa lafaa'iloon
translations.2: Qaloo sanurawidu AAanhu abahu wainna lafaAAiloona

words.translation: And he said|to his servants|Put|their merchandise|in|their saddlebags|so that they|may recognize it|when|they go back|to|their people|so that they may|return

translations.1: Wa-qaala lifityaanihij 'aloo bidaa'atahum fee rihaalihim la'allahum ya'rifoonahaaa izan qalabooo ilaaa ahlihim la'allahum yarji'oon
translations.2: Waqala lifityanihi ijAAaloo bidaAAatahum fee rihalihim laAAallahum yaAArifoonaha itha inqalaboo ila ahlihim laAAallahum yarjiAAoona

words.translation: So when|they returned|to|their father|they said|O our father!|Has been denied|to us|the measure|so send|with us|our brother|(that) we will get measure|And indeed we|for him|(will) surely (be) guardians

translations.1: Falammaa raja'ooo ilaaa abeehim qaaloo yaaa-abaanaa muni'a minnal kailu fa-arsil ma'anaaa akhaanaa naktal Wa-innaa lahoo lahaafizoon
translations.2: Falamma rajaAAoo ila abeehim qaloo ya abana muniAAa minna alkaylu faarsil maAAana akhana naktal wainna lahu lahafithoona

words.translation: He said|Should|I entrust you|with him|except|as|I entrusted you|with|his brother|before|before|But Allah|(is) the best|Guardian|and He|(is the) Most Merciful|(of) the merciful

translations.1: Qaala hal aamanukum 'alaihi illaa kamaa amintukum 'alaaa akheehi min qabl; fal-laahu khairun haafizanw Wa-Huwa arhamur Raahimeen
translations.2: Qala hal amanukum AAalayhi illa kama amintukum AAala akheehi min qablu faAllahu khayrun hafithan wahuwa arhamu alrrahimeena

words.translation: And when|they opened|their baggage|they found|their merchandise|returned|to them|They said|O our father!|What|(could) we desire|This|(is) our merchandise|returned|to us|And we will get provision|(for) our family|and we will protect|our brother|and get an increase|measure|NULL|That|(is) a measurement|easy

translations.1: Wa-lammaa fatahoo mataa-'ahum wajadoo bidaa'atahum ruddat ilaihim qaaloo yaaa-abaanaa maa nabghee; haazihee bida-'atunaa ruddat ilainaa Wa-nameeru ahlanaa Wa-nahfazu akhaanaa Wa-nazdaadu kaila ba'eer; zaalika kailuien yaseer
translations.2: Walamma fatahoo mataAAahum wajadoo bidaAAatahum ruddat ilayhim qaloo ya abana ma nabghee hathihi bidaAAatuna ruddat ilayna wanameeru ahlana wanahfathu akhana wanazdadu kayla baAAeerin thalika kaylun yaseerun

words.translation: He said|Never|will I send him|with you|until|you give to me|a promise|by|Allah|that surely you will bring him to me|that surely you will bring him to me|unless|that|you are surrounded|you are surrounded|And when|they had given him|their promise|he said|Allah|over|what|we say|(is) a Guardian

translations.1: Qaala lan ursilahoo ma'akum hattaa tu'tooni mawsiqam minal laahis lataa-tunnanee biheee illaaa aien yuhaata bikum falammaaa aatawhu mawsiqahum qaalal laahu 'alaa maa naqoolu Wakeel
translations.2: Qala lan orsilahu maAAakum hatta tutooni mawthiqan mina Allahi latatunnanee bihi illa an yuhata bikum falamma atawhu mawthiqahum qala Allahu AAala ma naqoolu wakeelun

words.translation: And he said|O my sons|(Do) not|enter|from|one gate|one gate|but enter|from|gates|different|And not|I can avail|you|against|Allah|any|thing|Not|(is) the decision|except|with Allah|upon Him|I put my trust|and upon Him|let put (their) trust|the ones who put trust

translations.1: Wa-qaala yaa-baniyya laa tadkhuloo mim baabinw waa-hidinw wadkhuloo min abwaabim mutafarriqah; Wa-maaa ughnee 'ankum minal laahi min shai'in; inil hukmu illaa lillaahi 'alaihi tawakkaltu Wa-'alaihi fal-yatawakkalil Mutawakkiloon
translations.2: Waqala ya baniyya la tadkhuloo min babin wahidin waodkhuloo min abwabin mutafarriqatin wama oghnee AAankum mina Allahi min shayin ini alhukmu illa lillahi AAalayhi tawakkaltu waAAalayhi falyatawakkali almutawakkiloona

words.translation: And when|they entered|from|where|ordered them|their father|not|it|avail(ed)|them|against|Allah|any|thing|but|(it was) a need|of|NULL|NULL|which he carried out|And indeed, he|(was) a possessor|(of) knowledge|because|We had taught him|but|most|(of) the people|(do) not|know

translations.1: Wa-lammaa dakhaloo min haisu amarahum aboohum maa kaana yughnee 'anhum minal laahi min shai'in illaa haajatan fee nafsi Ya'qooba qadaahaa; Wa-innahoo lazoo 'ilmil limaa 'allamnaahu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
translations.2: Walamma dakhaloo min haythu amarahum aboohum ma kana yughnee AAanhum mina Allahi min shayin illa hajatan fee nafsi yaAAqooba qadaha wainnahu lathoo AAilmin lima AAallamnahu walakinna akthara alnnasi la yaAAlamoona

words.translation: And when|they entered|upon|Yusuf|he took|to himself|his brother|He said|Indeed I|[I] am|your brother|so (do) not|grieve|for what|they used (to)|do

translations.1: Wa-lammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa aawaaa ilaihi akhaahu qaala inneee ana akhooka falaa tabta'is bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
translations.2: Walamma dakhaloo AAala yoosufa awa ilayhi akhahu qala innee ana akhooka fala tabtais bima kanoo yaAAmaloona

words.translation: So when|he had furnished them|with their supplies|he put|the drinking cup|in|the bag|(of) his brother|Then|called out|an announcer|O you|(in) the caravan!|Indeed you|surely (are) thieves

translations.1: Falammaa jahhazahum bijahaazihim ja'alas siqaayata fee rahli akheehi summa azzana mu'azzinun ayyatuhal 'eeru innakum lasaariqoon
translations.2: Falamma jahhazahum bijahazihim jaAAala alssiqayata fee rahli akheehi thumma aththana muaththinun ayyatuha alAAeeru innakum lasariqoona

words.translation: They said|turning towards|them|What (is it)|you miss

translations.1: Qaaloo Wa-aqbaloo 'alaihim maazaa tafqidoon
translations.2: Qaloo waaqbaloo AAalayhim matha tafqidoona

words.translation: They said|We are missing|(the) cup|(of) the king|And for (one) who|brings|it|(is) a load|(of) a camel|and I|for it|(is) responsible

translations.1: Qaaloo nafqidu suwaa'al maliki Wa-liman jaaa'a bihee himlu ba'eerinw Wa-ana bihee za'eem
translations.2: Qaloo nafqidu suwaAAa almaliki waliman jaa bihi himlu baAAeerin waana bihi zaAAeemun

words.translation: They said|By Allah|certainly|you know|not|we came|that we cause corruption|in|the land|and not|we are|thieves

translations.1: Qaaloo tallaahi laqad 'alimtum maa ji'na linufsida fil ardi Wa-maa kunnaa saariqeen
translations.2: Qaloo taAllahi laqad AAalimtum ma jina linufsida fee alardi wama kunna sariqeena

words.translation: They said|Then what|(will be the) recompense (of) it|if|you are|liars

translations.1: Qaaloo famaa jazaaa'u-hooo in kuntum kaazibeen
translations.2: Qaloo fama jazaohu in kuntum kathibeena

words.translation: They said|Its recompense|(is that one) who|it is found|in|his bag|then he|(will be) his recompense|Thus|(do) we recompense|the wrongdoers

translations.1: Qaaloo jazaaa'uhoo manw wujida fee rahlihee fahuwa jazaaa'uh; kazaalika najziz zaalimeen
translations.2: Qaloo jazaohu man wujida fee rahlihi fahuwa jazaohu kathalika najzee alththalimeena

words.translation: So he began|with their bags|before|(the) bag|(of) his brother|then|he brought it out|from|(the) bag|(of) his brother|Thus|(did) We plan|for Yusuf|He could not|He could not|take|his brother|by|the law|(of) the king|except|that|Allah willed|Allah willed|We raise|(in) degrees|whom|We will|but over|every|possessor|(of) knowledge|(is) the All-Knower

translations.1: Fabada-a bi-aw'iyatihim qabla wi'aaa'i akheehi summas takhrajahaa minw wi-'aaa'i akheeh; kazaalika kidnaa li-Yoosuf; maa kaana liyaakhuza akhaahu fee deenil maliki illaaa aien yashaaa'al laah; narfa'u darajaatim man nashaaa'; Wa-fawqa kulli zee 'ilmin 'Aleem
translations.2: Fabadaa biawAAiyatihim qabla wiAAai akheehi thumma istakhrajaha min wiAAai akheehi kathalika kidna liyoosufa ma kana liyakhutha akhahu fee deeni almaliki illa an yashaa Allahu narfaAAu darajatin man nashao wafawqa kulli thee AAilmin AAaleemun

words.translation: They said|If|he steals|then verily|stole|a brother|of his|before|before|But Yusuf kept it secret|But Yusuf kept it secret|within|himself|and (did) not|reveal it|to them|He said|You|(are the) worse|(in) position|and Allah|knows best|of what|you describe

translations.1: Qaaloo ien yasriq faqad saraqa akhul lahoo min qabl; fa-asarrahaa Yoosufu fee nafsihee Wa-lam yubdihaa lahum; qaala antum sharrum makaananw wallaahu a'lamu bimaa tasifoon
translations.2: Qaloo in yasriq faqad saraqa akhun lahu min qablu faasarraha yoosufu fee nafsihi walam yubdiha lahum qala antum sharrun makanan waAllahu aAAlamu bima tasifoona

words.translation: They said|O|Aziz!|Indeed|he has|a father|old|[great]|so take|one of us|(in) his place|Indeed we|[we] see you|of|the good-doers

translations.1: Qaaloo yaaa-ayyuhal 'Azeezu inna lahooo aban shaikhan kabeeran fakhuz ahadanaa makaanahoo innaa naraaka minal muhsineen
translations.2: Qaloo ya ayyuha alAAazeezu inna lahu aban shaykhan kabeeran fakhuth ahadana makanahu inna naraka mina almuhsineena

words.translation: He said|Allah forbid|Allah forbid|that|we take|except|(one) who|we found|our possession|with him|Indeed, we|then|surely (would be) wrongdoers

translations.1: Qaala ma'aazal laahi an naakhuza illaa manw wajadnaa mataa'anaa 'indahoo innaaa izal lazaalimoon
translations.2: Qala maAAatha Allahi an nakhutha illa man wajadna mataAAana AAindahu inna ithan lathalimoona

words.translation: So when|they despaired|of him|they secluded themselves|(in) private consultation|Said|the eldest among them|Do not|you know|that|your father|has taken|has taken|upon you|a promise|by|Allah|and before|and before|that|you failed|concerning|Yusuf|So never|will I leave|the land|until|permits|me|my father|or|Allah decides|Allah decides|for me|and He|(is) the Best|(of) the judges

translations.1: Falammas tay'asoo minhu khalasoo najiyyan qaala kabeeruhum alam ta'lamoon anna abaakum qad akhaza 'alaikum mawsiqam minal laahi Wa-min qablu maa farrattum fee Yoosufa falan abrahal arda hattaa yaazana leee abeee aw yahkumal laahu lee Wa-huwa khairul haakimeen
translations.2: Falamma istayasoo minhu khalasoo najiyyan qala kabeeruhum alam taAAlamoo anna abakum qad akhatha AAalaykum mawthiqan mina Allahi wamin qablu ma farrattum fee yoosufa falan abraha alarda hatta yathana lee abee aw yahkuma Allahu lee wahuwa khayru alhakimeena

words.translation: Return|to|your father|and say|O our father!|Indeed|your son|has stolen|and not|we testify|except|of what|we knew|And not|we were|of the unseen|guardians

translations.1: Irji'ooo ilaaa abeekum faqooloo yaaa-abaanaaa innab naka saraq; Wa-maa shahidnaaa illaa bimaa 'alimnaa Wa-maa kunnaa lilghaibi haafizeen
translations.2: IrjiAAoo ila abeekum faqooloo ya abana inna ibnaka saraqa wama shahidna illa bima AAalimna wama kunna lilghaybi hafitheena

words.translation: And ask|the town|where|we were|[in it]|and the caravan|which|we returned|[in it]|And indeed we|surely (are) truthful

translations.1: Was'alil qaryatal latee kunnaa feehaa wal'eeral lateee aqbalnaa feehaa Wa-innaa lasaadiqoon
translations.2: Waisali alqaryata allatee kunna feeha waalAAeera allatee aqbalna feeha wainna lasadiqoona

words.translation: He said|Nay|have enticed|you|your souls|something|so patience|(is) beautiful|Perhaps|Allah|will bring them to me|will bring them to me|will bring them to me|all|Indeed, He|He|(is) the All-Knower|All-Wise

translations.1: Qaala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jameelun 'asal laahu aien yaa-tiyanee bihim jamee'aa; innahoo Huwal 'Aleemul Hakeem
translations.2: Qala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jameelun AAasa Allahu an yatiyanee bihim jameeAAan innahu huwa alAAaleemu alhakeemu

words.translation: And he turned away|from them|and said|Alas my grief|over|Yusuf!|And became white|his eyes|from|the grief|and he (was)|a suppressor

translations.1: Wa-tawallaa 'anhum Wa-qaala yaaa-asafaa 'alaa Yoosufa wabyaddat 'aynaahu minal huzni fahuwa kazeem
translations.2: Watawalla AAanhum waqala ya asafa AAala yoosufa waibyaddat AAaynahu mina alhuzni fahuwa katheemun

words.translation: They said|By Allah|you will not cease|remembering|Yusuf|until|you become|fatally ill|or|become|of|those who perish

translations.1: Qaaloo tallaahi tafta'u tazkuru Yoosufa hattaa takoona haradan aw takoona minal haalikeen
translations.2: Qaloo taAllahi taftao tathkuru yoosufa hatta takoona haradan aw takoona mina alhalikeena

words.translation: He said|Only|I complain|(of) my suffering|and my grief|to|Allah|and I know|from|Allah|what|not|you know

translations.1: Qaala innamaaa ashkoo bassee Wa-huzneee ilal laahi Wa-a'lamu minal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon
translations.2: Qala innama ashkoo baththee wahuznee ila Allahi waaAAlamu mina Allahi ma la taAAlamoona

words.translation: O my sons|Go|and inquire|about|Yusuf|and his brother|and not|despair|of|(the) Mercy of Allah|(the) Mercy of Allah|Indeed|none|despairs|of|(the) Mercy of Allah|(the) Mercy of Allah|except|the people|the disbelievers

translations.1: Yaa-baniyyaz haboo fatahassasoo mien Yoosufa Wa-akheehi Wa-laa tai'asoo mir rawhil laahi innahoo laa yai'asu mir rawhil laahi illal qawmul kaafiroon
translations.2: Ya baniyya ithhaboo fatahassasoo min yoosufa waakheehi wala tayasoo min rawhi Allahi innahu la yayasu min rawhi Allahi illa alqawmu alkafiroona

words.translation: So when|they entered|upon him|they said|O Aziz|O Aziz|Has touched us|and our family|the adversity|and we have come|with goods|(of) little value|but pay (in) full|to us|the measure|and be charitable|to us|Indeed|Allah|rewards|the charitable

translations.1: Falammaa dakhaloo 'alaihi qaaloo yaaa-ayyuhal 'Azeezu massanaa Wa-ahlanad durru Wa-ji'naa bibidaa 'timmuzjaatin fa-awfi lanal kaila Wa-tasaddaq 'alainaa innal laaha yajzil mutasaddiqeen
translations.2: Falamma dakhaloo AAalayhi qaloo ya ayyuha alAAazeezu massana waahlana alddurru wajina bibidaAAatin muzjatin faawfi lana alkayla watasaddaq AAalayna inna Allaha yajzee almutasaddiqeena

words.translation: He said|Do|you know|what|you did|with Yusuf|and his brother|when|you were|ignorant

translations.1: Qaala hal 'alimtum maa fa'altum bi-Yoosufa Wa-akheehi iz antum jaahiloon
translations.2: Qala hal AAalimtum ma faAAaltum biyoosufa waakheehi ith antum jahiloona

words.translation: They said|Are you indeed|[surely you]|Yusuf|He said|I am|Yusuf|and this|(is) my brother|Indeed|Allah has been gracious|Allah has been gracious|to us|Indeed, he|who|fears Allah|and (is) patient|then indeed|Allah|(does) not|let go waste|(the) reward|(of) the good-doers

translations.1: Qaaloo 'a-innaka la-anta Yoosufu qaala ana Yoosufu Wa-haazaaa akhee qad mannal laahu 'alainaa innahoo mai yattaqi Wa-yasbir fa-innal laaha laa yudee'u ajral muhsineen
translations.2: Qaloo ainnaka laanta yoosufa qala ana yoosufu wahatha akhee qad manna Allahu AAalayna innahu man yattaqi wayasbir fainna Allaha la yudeeAAu ajra almuhsineena

words.translation: They said|By Allah|certainly|Allah has preferred you|Allah has preferred you|over us|and indeed|we have been|sinners

translations.1: Qaaloo tallaahi laqad aasarakal laahu 'alainaa Wa-in kunnaa lakhaati'een
translations.2: Qaloo taAllahi laqad atharaka Allahu AAalayna wain kunna lakhatieena

words.translation: He said|No|blame|upon you|today|Allah will forgive|Allah will forgive|you|and He|(is) the Most Merciful|(of) those who show mercy

translations.1: Qaala laa tasreeba 'alaikumul yawma yaghfirul laahu lakum Wa-Huwa arhamur raahimeen
translations.2: Qala la tathreeba AAalaykumu alyawma yaghfiru Allahu lakum wahuwa arhamu alrrahimeena

words.translation: Go|with this shirt of mine|with this shirt of mine|and cast it|over|(the) face|(of) my father|he will regain sight|he will regain sight|And bring to me|your family|all together

translations.1: Izhaboo biqameesee haazaa fa-alqoohu 'alaa wajhi abee yaati baseeranw waatoonee bi-ahlikum ajma'een
translations.2: Ithhaboo biqameesee hatha faalqoohu AAala wajhi abee yati baseeran watoonee biahlikum ajmaAAeena

words.translation: And when|departed|the caravan|their father said|their father said|Indeed, I|[I] find|(the) smell|(of) Yusuf|if not|that|you think me weakened in mind

translations.1: Wa-lammaa fasalatil 'eeru qaala aboohum innee la-ajidu reeha Yoosufa law-laaa an tufannidoon
translations.2: Walamma fasalati alAAeeru qala aboohum innee laajidu reeha yoosufa lawla an tufannidooni

words.translation: They said|By Allah|indeed you|surely (are) in|your error|old

translations.1: Qaaloo tallaahi innaka lafee dalaalikal qadeem
translations.2: Qaloo taAllahi innaka lafee dalalika alqadeemi

words.translation: Then when|[that]|arrived|the bearer of glad tidings|he cast it|over|his face|then returned (his) sight|then returned (his) sight|He said|Did not|I say|to you|indeed, I|[I] know|from|Allah|what|not|you know

translations.1: Falammaaa an jaaa' albasheeru alqaahu 'alaa wajhihee fartadda baseeran qaala alam aqul lakum inneee a'lamu minal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon
translations.2: Falamma an jaa albasheeru alqahu AAala wajhihi fairtadda baseeran qala alam aqul lakum innee aAAlamu mina Allahi ma la taAAlamoona

words.translation: They said|O our father!|Ask forgiveness|for us|(of) our sins|Indeed we|have been|sinners

translations.1: Qaaloo yaaa-abaanas taghfir lanaa zunoo-banaaa innaa kunnaa khaati'een
translations.2: Qaloo ya abana istaghfir lana thunoobana inna kunna khatieena

words.translation: He said|Soon|I will ask forgiveness|for you|(from) my Lord|Indeed He|He|(is) the Oft-Forgiving|the Most Merciful

translations.1: Qaala sawfa astaghfiru lakum Rabbeee innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem
translations.2: Qala sawfa astaghfiru lakum rabbee innahu huwa alghafooru alrraheemu

words.translation: Then when|they entered|upon|Yusuf|he took|to himself|his parents|and said|Enter|Egypt|if|Allah wills|Allah wills|safe

translations.1: Falammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa aawaaa ilaihi abayaihi Wa-qaalad khuloo Misra in shaaa' al-laahu aamineen
translations.2: Falamma dakhaloo AAala yoosufa awa ilayhi abawayhi waqala odkhuloo misra in shaa Allahu amineena

words.translation: And he raised|his parents|upon|the throne|and they fell down|to him|prostrate|And he said|O my father|This|(is the) interpretation|(of) my dream|(of) before|(of) before|Verily|has made it|my Lord|true|And indeed|He was good|to me|when|He took me out|of|the prison|and brought|you|from|the bedouin life|after|after|[that]|had caused discord|the Shaitaan|between me|and between|my brothers|Indeed|my Lord|(is) Most Subtle|to what|He wills|Indeed, He|He|(is) the All-Knower|the All-Wise

translations.1: Wa-raf'a abawaihi 'alal 'arshi Wa-kharroo lahoo sujjadaa; Wa-qaala yaaa-abati haaza taaweelu ru'yaaya min qablu qad ja'alahaa Rabbee haqqaa; Wa-qad ahsana beee iz akhrajanee minas sijni Wa-jaaa'a bikum minal badwi mim ba'di an nazaghash Shaitaanu bainee Wa-baina ikhwatee; inna Rabbee lateeful limaa yashaaa'; innahoo Huwal 'Aleemul Hakeem
translations.2: WarafaAAa abawayhi AAala alAAarshi wakharroo lahu sujjadan waqala ya abati hatha taweelu ruyaya min qablu qad jaAAalaha rabbee haqqan waqad ahsana bee ith akhrajanee mina alssijni wajaa bikum mina albadwi min baAAdi an nazagha alshshaytanu baynee wabayna ikhwatee inna rabbee lateefun lima yashao innahu huwa alAAaleemu alhakeemu

words.translation: My Lord|indeed|you have given me|of|the sovereignty|and taught me|of|the interpretation|of the events|Creator|(of) the heavens|and the earth|You|(are) my Protector|in|the world|and the Hereafter|Cause me to die|(as) a Muslim|and join me|with the righteous

translations.1: Rabbi qad aataitanee minal mulki Wa-'allamtanee min taaweelil ahaadees; faati-ras samaawaati wal-ardi Anta waliyyee fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirati tawaffanee muslimanw Wa-alhiqnee bissaaliheen
translations.2: Rabbi qad ataytanee mina almulki waAAallamtanee min taweeli alahadeethi fatira alssamawati waalardi anta waliyyee fee alddunya waalakhirati tawaffanee musliman waalhiqnee bialssaliheena

words.translation: That|(is) from|the news|(of) the unseen|which We reveal|to you|And not|you were|with them|when|they put together|their plan|while they|(were) plotting

translations.1: Zaalika min ambaaa'il ghaibi nooheehi ilaika Wa-maa kunta ladaihim iz ajma'ooo amrahum Wa-hum yamkuroon
translations.2: Thalika min anbai alghaybi nooheehi ilayka wama kunta ladayhim ith ajmaAAoo amrahum wahum yamkuroona

words.translation: And not|most|(of) the mankind|even though|you desire|(will be) believers

translations.1: Wa-maa aksarun naasi Wa-law harasta bimu'mineen
translations.2: Wama aktharu alnnasi walaw harasta bimumineena

words.translation: And not|you ask them|for it|any|reward|Not|(is) it|but|a reminder|to the worlds

translations.1: Wa-maa tas'aluhum 'alaihi min ajr; in huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen
translations.2: Wama tasaluhum AAalayhi min ajrin in huwa illa thikrun lilAAalameena

words.translation: And how many|of|a Sign|in|the heavens|and the earth|they pass|over it|while they|(are) from them|the ones who turn away

translations.1: Wa-ka-ayyim min Aayatin fis samaawaati wal-ardi yamurroona 'alaihaa Wa-hum 'anhaa mu'ridoon
translations.2: Wakaayyin min ayatin fee alssamawati waalardi yamurroona AAalayha wahum AAanha muAAridoona

words.translation: And not|believe|most of them|in Allah|except|while they|associate partners with Him

translations.1: Wa-maa yu'minu aksaru-hum billaahi illaa Wa-hum mushrikoon
translations.2: Wama yuminu aktharuhum biAllahi illa wahum mushrikoona

words.translation: Do they then feel secure|(against) that|comes to them|an overwhelming|[of]|punishment|(of) Allah|or|comes to them|the Hour|suddenly|while they|(do) not|perceive

translations.1: Afa-aminooo an taatiya-hum ghaashiyatum min 'azaabil laahi aw taatiyahumus Saa'atu baghtatanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon
translations.2: Afaaminoo an tatiyahum ghashiyatun min AAathabi Allahi aw tatiyahumu alssaAAatu baghtatan wahum la yashAAuroona

words.translation: Say|This|(is) my way|I invite|to|Allah|with|insight|I|and whoever|follows me|And Glory be|(to) Allah|and not|I am|of|the polytheists

translations.1: Qul haazihee sabeeleee ad'ooo ilal laah; 'alaa baseera-tin ana Wa-manit taba'anee Wa-Subhaanal laahi Wa-maaa ana minal mushrikeen
translations.2: Qul hathihi sabeelee adAAoo ila Allahi AAala baseeratin ana wamani ittabaAAanee wasubhana Allahi wama ana mina almushrikeena

words.translation: And not|We sent|before you|before you|but|men|We revealed|to them|from (among)|(the) people|(of) the townships|So have not|they traveled|in|the earth|and seen|how|was|(the) end|(of) those who|(were) before them|(were) before them|And surely the home|(of) the Hereafter|(is) best|for those who|fear Allah|Then will not|you use reason

translations.1: Wa-maaa arsalnaa min qablika illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim min ahlil quraa; afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; Wa-la-Daarul Aakhirati Khairul lillazeenat taqaw; afalaa ta'qiloon
translations.2: Wama arsalna min qablika illa rijalan noohee ilayhim min ahli alqura afalam yaseeroo fee alardi fayanthuroo kayfa kana AAaqibatu allatheena min qablihim waladaru alakhirati khayrun lillatheena ittaqaw afala taAAqiloona

words.translation: Until|when|gave up hope|the Messengers|and thought|that they|certainly|were denied|then came to them|Our help|and was saved|whom|We willed|And not|(can) be repelled|Our punishment|from|the people|(who are) criminals

translations.1: Hattaaa izas tai'asar Rusulu Wa-zannooo annahum qad kuziboo jaaa'ahum nas-runaa fanujjiya man nashaaa'u Wa-laa yuraddu baasunna 'anil qawmil mujrimeen
translations.2: Hatta itha istayasa alrrusulu wathannoo annahum qad kuthiboo jaahum nasruna fanujjiya man nashao wala yuraddu basuna AAani alqawmi almujrimeena

words.translation: Verily|(there) is|in|their stories|a lesson|for men|(of) understanding|Not|(it) is|a narration|invented|but|a confirmation|(of that) which|(was) before it|(was) before it|and a detailed explanation|(of) all|things|and a guidance|and mercy|for a people|who believe

translations.1: Laqad kaana fee qasasihim 'ibratul li-ulil albaab; maa kaana hadeesany yuftaraa Wa-laakin tasdeeqal lazee baina yadihi Wa-tafseela kulli shai'inw Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatal liqawmien yu'minoon
translations.2: Laqad kana fee qasasihim AAibratun liolee alalbabi ma kana hadeethan yuftara walakin tasdeeqa allathee bayna yadayhi watafseela kulli shayin wahudan warahmatan liqawmin yuminoona
